message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $10,000. This is a great opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $12,000 to you at an attractive price.
Alice, your offer is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $9,000.  Would you be willing to come down a little?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. In order to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am willing to consider a price of $9,500 for the product. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.
